name: HiResClock
keywords: ARM, pjrc, clock, std::chrono, High Resolution, Teensy
description: The HiResClock library implements an std::chrono compatible clock for ARM controllers which implement the ARM_DWT_CYCCNT cycle counter (e.g. Teensy 3.x, 4.x) It counts time in nanoseconds since 1970-01-01 00:00. HiResClock uses the ARM Cycle counter as time base.
